casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Anthony Wayne WALKER, Appellant. WD 80483 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: July 31, 2018
Application for Transfer to Supreme Court Denied August 28, 2018
Application for Transfer Denied December 4, 2018 Damien De Loyola, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant Richard Starnes, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent Before Division One: Thomas H. Newton, P.J., Alok Ahuja, and Gary D. Witt, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Mr. Anthony Wayne Walker appeals his convictions by a Jackson County jury of three counts of first-degree murder, three associated counts of armed criminal action, and one count of first-degree burglary. The trial court sentenced him to three consecutive life sentences without parole, consecutive to three consecutive thirty-year sentences and a consecutive fifteen-year sentence in the Department of Corrections. We affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
